body_html: The error is that your input is of type torch.ByteTensor, but should be torch.FloatTensor. Pass input.float() instead of input to your network. The error message is confusing, but I believe that has been fixed after v0.12
body_text: The error is that your input is of type torch.ByteTensor, but should be torch.FloatTensor. Pass input.float() instead of input to your network. The error message is confusing, but I believe that has been fixed after v0.12
body: The error is that your input is of type `torch.ByteTensor`, but should be `torch.FloatTensor`. Pass `input.float()` instead of `input` to your network. The error message is confusing, but I believe that has been fixed after v0.12
